title.en: Verses of Aspiration for the Fulfilment of the Enlightened Vision of Khenchen Jigme Phuntsok, the Reincarnation of Tertön Lerab Lingpa

text.en: O lord of sages, Śākyamuni, who through abandoning and realizing attained supreme buddhahood,
text.en-trans: pang tok deshek chok nyé tubpé wang

text.en: With your heart sons, Lord Maitreya and Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: dé sé tuwo jam gön jampé yang

text.en: The seven patriarchs,1the seventeen great paṇḍitas2and the like,
text.en-trans: té rab nam dünpa chen chudün sok

text.en: All you great founders of the teachings in the noble land of India,
text.en-trans: pakyul tenpé jungné ché nam dang

text.en: And especially you who introduced the excellent path in Tibet;
text.en-trans: khyepar bhoté jong su lek lam go

text.en: The three ancestral Dharma kings,3
text.en-trans: jé dzé chö kyi gyalpo mé wön sum

text.en: The second buddha—Padmākara,
text.en-trans: sangye nyipa pema karé zhab

text.en: Śāntarakṣita and your entire lineage: recollecting your kindness fills us with faith and devotion.
text.en-trans: zhitso gyü ché kadrin dren zhin dé

text.en: So as to bring living inspiration to countless beings, you spread
text.en-trans: mi jik zhiden namdren gyalwé ten

text.en: The teachings of Buddha, our victorious guide endowed with fourfold fearlessness,
text.en-trans: tamé drowé sö su pelwé lé

text.en: Radiating them, with the five perfections, to fortunate disciples in every direction,
text.en-trans: püntsok ngaden kalzang chok küntu

text.en: O learned, skilful and noble lama, to you we pray.
text.en-trans: tro khé jetsün lamar solwa deb

text.en: When the time came for the enlightened aspiration and actions
text.en-trans: tubten gyatso gyalwé wangpo yi

text.en: Of the Dalai Lama Thubten Gyatso to be fulfilled, it was through their spiritual link
text.en-trans: tukkyé trinlé dü bab damtsik lé

text.en: That Lerab Lingpa, with his cycle of teachings,
text.en-trans: tertön lerab lingpé chö kor gyi

text.en: Brought a wealth of auspiciousness to the people of the Land of Snows.
text.en-trans: gangjong dro la shipé pal yön drub

text.en: Even amidst the oppressive darkness of the five degenerations,
text.en-trans: nga dö güpé makrum trö du yang

text.en: You perfected your study, contemplation and meditation on all the outer and inner piṭakas, and countless scriptures,
text.en-trans: chinang denö rabjam zhung gyé dön

text.en: Reached the highest experience and realization of their meaning,
text.en-trans: sen sam gom drub nyamtok tarsönpa

text.en: And stood out, as the supreme holder of the definitive teachings.
text.en-trans: khyö ni ngedön tendzin chok tu zheng

text.en: When the fierce winds of change blew with unbearable intensity,
text.en-trans: dü gyur mi zé tsub lung ché dang mö

text.en: Your determination and resolve remained steadfast like the king of mountains,
text.en-trans: gang gi tukkyé riwang tar tenpé

text.en: And those in saffron robes, upholders of the three trainings,
text.en-trans: lab sum ngurmik dzinpé düdé sok

text.en: And devoted followers in their thousands, flocked around you.
text.en-trans: deden tritrak ngang gi düpar gyur

text.en: Day by day, by means of study, practice and spiritual activity,
text.en-trans: shedrub jawa lé kyi khorlo yi

text.en: You fulfilled the deepest wishes of beings who came from far and wide,
text.en-trans: nyinzhin chok zhi kyewö ré dün kang

text.en: And with a great Dharma rain of ripening empowerments and liberating teachings, vast and profound,
text.en-trans: mindrol zabgyé chö kyi druchar ché

text.en: You planted the perfect seed of enlightenment within us all.
text.en-trans: kün la namjang sabön drungpo trün

text.en: From the teachings of the śrāvakas up to Atiyoga,
text.en-trans: nyentö né zung atiyogé bar

text.en: You transmitted the scriptural traditions of all the vehicles,
text.en-trans: yongdzok tekpa kün gyi zhungluk dang

text.en: Along with every drop of nectar from the pith instructions,
text.en-trans: mengak dütsi nying chü malüpa

text.en: And satisfied the hearts of all your fortunate disciples.
text.en-trans: tsal té kalden malü tsimpar dzé

text.en: How clearly we recall the maṇḍala of your perfect form,
text.en-trans: gang kü kyilkhor yi la lham mér dren

text.en: How distinct the deep melody of your enlightened speech,
text.en-trans: gang sung zab nyen dang zang lhang nger sal

text.en: How vivid the knowledge and affection of your wisdom mind:
text.en-trans: gang tuk khyentsé gongpa saller char

text.en: Remembering all your noble qualities, fervently we pray to you.
text.en-trans: gang gi yönten samzhin soldeb tsön

text.en: All of us who are your followers pledge
text.en-trans: dakchak khyé kyi jesu lobpa kün

text.en: With unwavering effort, to apply faith, diligence and critical intelligence
text.en-trans: tekpa rim gü damchö yizhin dzö

text.en: To the wish-granting Dharma treasury of the nine vehicles,
text.en-trans: dé tsön namchö dormé nyingrü kyi

text.en: And to devote ourselves, always, to the practice of contemplation and meditation.
text.en-trans: taktu sam gomnyam len bepar tsal

text.en: Through the power of this prayer to you, our protector, may all your aspirations
text.en-trans: dé tü gönpo khyö kyi tuk zhé nam

text.en: Be perfectly realized, and so bring inspiration to beings throughout the whole of space,
text.en-trans: khakhyab kyendrö sö su lek min zhing

text.en: And may we all never be separated from the teachers of the supreme vehicle,
text.en-trans: dak sok kyé kün tek chok shenyen dang

text.en: So that we cultivate completely the qualities of experience and realization.
text.en-trans: mindral nyamtok yönten rab pel shok

text.en: Through the vast and compassionate blessings of the lamas, yidams and ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: tsawa sum gyi tukjé jin chen dang

text.en: Through the power of interdependence, the nature of things, which is beyond all imagining,
text.en-trans: chönyi tendrel sam mi khyabpé tu

text.en: And through the strength of unchanging and fervent devotion in both teacher and students,
text.en-trans: la lob dé dung gyurmé tob tsenpé

text.en: May these aspirations come to pass, just as we desire!
text.en-trans: mön dön didak yizhin drubpar shok
